text.tspan: LOCATION OF PEACE OFFICER’S REQUEST FOR SURRENDER OF DRIVER’S LICENCE
SIGNATURE OF PEACE OFFICER ISSUING SUSPENSION NOTICE BADGE NUMBER
POLICE AGENCY OR RCMP UNIT AGENCY FILE NUMBER
SIGNATURE OF PERSON RECEIVING VEHICLE DATE AND TIME RELEASED
RETURNING OFFICER RECEIPT OF LICENCE ACKNOWLEDGED
This suspension from driving will be recorded on your British
Columbia driving record and may be considered by the
Superintendent of Motor Vehicles when reviewing your driving
YOUR LICENCE TO DRIVE IS HEREBY SUSPENDED UNDER
SECTION 90.3 OF THE MOTOR VEHICLE ACT FOR A PERIOD OF
hours on the day of Year
Be warned that if you drive a motor vehicle while
suspended, the following section of the Motor
90.4 (1) A person who holds a driver’s licence on which
a condition has been imposed under section 25
(10.1) commits an offence if the person drives
a motor vehicle on a highway or industrial road
knowing that the person’s driver’s licence has been
